issues.summary: [Cypress] Add cypress test for pre-checkout journey
issues.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e3fcef}
Acceptance criteria

Create a new test for OTP users:

* Apply a voucher
* Validate the entire journey 
* Validate the SKU in the subscription 
* Make sure the user pays full price, and the voucher is not applied
* Make sure /cancel endpoint is called after check-out 
{panel}

comments.author: Himash Tehan
comments.body:
*Current Behaviour*
As a logged-out customer, when navigating to [https://www-staging.goodchop.com/one-time-deliveries|https://www-staging.goodchop.com/one-time-deliveries], instead of re-directing to [https://www-staging.goodchop.com/login|https://www-staging.goodchop.com/login], the page is mounted and the page content is visible.

!Screenshot 2026-01-06 at 11.07.05.png|width=1159,height=879,alt="Screenshot 2026-01-06 at 11.07.05.png"!

issues.summary: Add LoggedInUserGuard to Good Chop One-Time Deliveries Module

comments.author: Romina Nicastro
comments.body:
I think we can add another Guard for a few different scenarios (apart from the login one), depending on what would be the expected flow. For instance:

* OTP customers and no subscription or no active subscription: they can access {{/one-time-deliveries}} page
* OTP customers and active subscription: redirect to dashboard? Or they can access to OTP dashboard?
* No OTP orders and subscription (active or cancelled): redirect to dashboard
* No OTP orders and no subscription: redirect to plans page

comments.author: Beatrice Dimarucut
comments.body:
Note to self: guards impact whether people can access the OTP Dashboard eg if they type the URL manually from their browser

Unlikely that someone who does _not_ have an OTP order would actually know/save the OTP Dashboard URL so not a must; more of an edge case since usually customers who click the good chop header will either stay on the funnel (logged out) or get redirected to My Deliveries with an active subscription

issues.summary: "Edit your selection" entrypoint is missing when customers re-order box
[Plans Page] - Yellow banner shouldn't show
issues.description:
{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*Description*
When customer comes from graduation component on OTP dashboard to plans page and otp is selected by default the blue banner doesn’t show. 
Instead, when the customer changes to subscribe and save, there’s this yellow banner (the assumption is that this is the same as shown for subscription customers when they’re logged in and apply a voucher) 

This banner doesn’t have discount information and it’s not possible to dismiss. For more information on the flow see video
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#e3fcef}
*AC*
Yellow banner doesn’t show for otp customers making a second purchase
Blue banner shows with the discount communication (this is already the case when the customer lands on plans page and subscribe and save is pre selected)

{panel}

!Screen Recording 2026-01-16 at 16.18.29.mov|width=2822,height=1504,alt="Screen Recording 2026-01-16 at 16.18.29.mov"!

!Blue-banner-should-appear.png|width=1307,height=827,alt="Blue-banner-should-appear.png"!

!yellow_banner_shoulndt_show.png|width=438,height=587,alt="yellow_banner_shoulndt_show.png"!

issues.summary: Firefighter W02-03
Header entrypoint to /one-time-deliveries
issues.description:
{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
h3. Description

The task requires adding a new header entry titled "One-time orders" which is displayed exclusively for customers who are logged in with an OTP (One-Time Purchase) order. The requirements for this feature are as follows:

* The "One-time box" header entry must be visible only when the user is logged in as an OTP customer.
* The header entry should include a link that navigates the user to the OTP dashboard page when clicked.
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#e3fcef}
h3. Acceptance Criteria

* “One-time box” header entry visible when logged in as an OTP customer only
* "One-time box" link navigates to OTP dashboard page



Desktop:

!image-20260114-102522.png|width=720,alt="image-20260114-102522.png"!

Mobile:

!image-20260114-102603.png|width=337,alt="image-20260114-102603.png"!


{panel}

issues.summary: [Navigation] Update desktop navigation for logged in users
issues.description:
{panel:bgColor=#eae6ff}
*Description*

As part of the Dashboard Improvements initiative, we want to update the navigation for logged in active users.

Changes:

Left navbar:

* Dashboard {color:#ffc400}*ALTERED*{color} -> rename to “Home” 
* Add-ons {color:#ff5630}*NEW*{color} -> should open the add-ons drawer
* Pet profile {color:#ff5630}*NEW*{color}
* Get $60 {color:#4c9aff}*MOVED*{color} -> rename to “Gift Free Food”, remove 10+ (should we keep the icon?)
* Settings {color:#4c9aff}*MOVED*{color} (should we keep the icon?)
* Contact us {color:#36b37e}*SAME*{color}

Right navbar:

* Pet switcher {color:#ffc400}*ALTERED*{color} -> remove “Add a new pup” from dropdown
* -Add a new pup- {color:#4c9aff}*-MOVED-*{color} --> visible without clicking on the pet switcher, enabled only for users who are eligible to more dogs, disabled for users who have a cancelled subscription- (here just for reference, but it’s out of scope for this ticket as it’s done in [[TPT-2584]|https://hellofresh.atlassian.net/browse/TPT-2584].
* Pet Parent name {color:#ffc400}*ALTERED*{color} -> remove settings from dropdown, keep “Log out”

!image-20260119-110954.png|width=630,alt="image-20260119-110954.png"!
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#ffebe6}
*Out of Scope* 

* Adding the {{Add a new pup}} entry-point to the right navbar is out of scope on this ticket as it should be done in a previous ticket.
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#e3fcef}
*Acceptance Criteria* *_(focus on the what, not the how)_*

* WHEN I am a customer with an active subscription
* AND I am logged in and on desktop view
* THEN I should see the navbar containing:
** Left side
***  Home
*** Add-ons
*** Pet Profile
*** Gift Free Food
*** Contact Us
*** Settings
** Right side:
*** My pet’s name (being clickable and when clicked, I should see my other pets names if I have other subscriptions, and *I should not see* an Add new pup link in the dropdown)
*** + Add new pup 
*** My name (being clickable and when clicked, showing an option to log out)

!
issues.reporter: Andrea Martins Costa L F Nascimento

links.summary: [Navigation] Add "Add new pup" to desktop right navigation -> logged in users
